title: Pr1nt business card
content:
Sales representative business card for a new print brokering business I started last month. Heavy on collage illustration to show off vibrant color.   
Logo P is modified from Peter Bilak's Fedra Text. text is set in Fedra Text. site to launch in mid May will use (soon to be released) Fedra Screen. I have a 3D logo in the works which is currently done in plastic plaster, I am weighing its effectiveness and aesthethics before I do it in 3D and eventually in plasma cut steel. ![PR1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417070408im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1129.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
Ole, you've been using Fedra to great effect!   
   
\> I am weighing its effectiveness   
   
Knowing your hardware work, you better weigh the weight too! :-)   
   
BTW, what's different about Fedra Screen?   
   
hhp

The "new business card design for www.pr1nt" above the file is Fedra Screen. the f dips with a descender for starters, Anyway here is the rest of it so you can see for yourself.   
 ![Fedra Bitmat alphabet.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417070408im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1139.jpg)

Very nice. I love the monetary qualities it   
invokes. It's very rich without feeling overdone.
